conditions.name: Is available
conditions.description: Test if the Instant Games platform is available.

conditions.name: On pause
conditions.description: Triggered when the Instant Games platform wants your game to pause in order to handle an interruption.

conditions.name: On loaded player data
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Load player data' when the data is available.

conditions.name: On error
conditions.description: Triggered if an error occurs while using the Instant Games platform.

conditions.name: On connected players loaded
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Load connected players' when the data is available.

conditions.name: On score submitted
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Set score' when the score has been submitted.

conditions.name: On player score loaded
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Load player score' when the data is available.

conditions.name: On leaderboard loaded
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Load leaderboard scores' when the data is available.

conditions.name: On shortcut created
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Create home screen shortcut' when a shortcut was successfully created.

conditions.name: On shortcut failed
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Create home screen shortcut' when a shortcut could not be created.

conditions.name: On load ad success
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Load ad' when the ad is ready to be shown.

params.name: Ad type
params.description: The type of advert that was loaded.

conditions.name: On load ad error
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Load ad' if the ad fails to load.

params.name: Ad type
params.description: The type of advert that was loaded.

conditions.name: On show ad success
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Show ad' when the user finishes viewing the ad.

params.name: Ad type
params.description: The type of advert that was shown.

conditions.name: On show ad error
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Show ad' if the ad fails to be shown.

params.name: Ad type
params.description: The type of advert that was shown.

conditions.name: On context changed
conditions.description: Triggered after the 'Change context' action when the user successfully switched to another context.

conditions.name: On context change cancelled
conditions.description: Triggered after the 'Change context' action when the user cancels the context change.

conditions.name: Supports feature
conditions.description: Test if an Instant Games feature is supported on the current platform.

params.name: Feature
params.description: The feature to check if supported.

actions.name: Set player data
actions.description: Store some data for this player on the Instant Games platform.

params.name: Data
params.description: A string of data to save for the player. Consider using a JSON string, e.g. from the Dictionary plugin.

actions.name: Load player data
actions.description: Request to load the last set player data. Triggers 'On loaded player data' when loaded.

actions.name: Share
actions.description: Invokes a dialog to invite, request, challenge or share, in a chat or timeline.

params.name: Image
params.description: A Sprite object to take an image from for the share.

params.name: Text
params.description: A message to include with the share.

params.name: Data
params.description: A string of data to attach, available as EntryPointData if launched from the share. Max 1000 chars.

params.name: Switch context
params.description: Whether to switch the user into the new context created on sharing.

actions.name: Log event
actions.description: Log an analytics event for the game.

params.name: Event name
params.description: Name of the analytics event to log.

params.name: Value to sum
params.description: An optional number that FB Analytics can calculate a sum with.

actions.name: Load connected players
actions.description: Request a list of connected players. Triggers 'On connected players loaded' when done.

actions.name: Set score
actions.description: Set the player's score on a leaderboard.

params.name: Leaderboard
params.description: Name of the leaderboard to submit to.

params.name: Contextual
params.description: Set according to whether the leaderboard was created as contextual or not.

params.name: Score
params.description: The score to set for this player.

actions.name: Load player score
actions.description: Load the player's own score and rank, triggering 'On player score loaded' when done.

params.name: Leaderboard
params.description: Name of the leaderboard to load from.

params.name: Contextual
params.description: Set according to whether the leaderboard was created as contextual or not.

actions.name: Load leaderboard scores
actions.description: Load a list of scores from a leaderboard.

params.name: Leaderboard
params.description: Name of the leaderboard to load from.

params.name: Contextual
params.description: Set according to whether the leaderboard was created as contextual or not.

params.name: Count
params.description: The number of leaderboard scores to request.

params.name: Results
params.description: Return results for either all results or only those for connected players.

actions.name: Create home screen shortcut
actions.description: (Android only) Request to create a home screen shortcut.

actions.name: Load ad
actions.description: Load an advert. Once loaded it is ready to be shown.

params.name: Ad type
params.description: The type of advert to load.

params.name: Placement ID
params.description: The ad placement ID to load.

actions.name: Show ad
actions.description: Show an ad that has been successfully loaded.

params.name: Ad type
params.description: The type of advert to show. An ad of this type must have previously been loaded.

actions.name: Custom update
actions.description: Post a custom update in to a message thread.
actions.display_text: Post custom update with template ID [i]{0}[/i], CTA [i]{1}[/i], image {2}, text [i]{3}[/i], data [i]{4}[/i], strategy [i]{5}[/i], notification [i]{6}[/i]

params.name: Template ID
params.description: ID of the template this custom update is using, as defined in fbapp-config.json.

params.name: CTA
params.description: Optional "call to action" (CTA) button text. Leave empty to use the default ("Play").

params.name: Image
params.description: A Sprite object to take an image from for the update.

params.name: Text
params.description: A message to include with the update.

params.name: Data
params.description: A string of data to attach, available as EntryPointData if launched from the update. Max 1000 chars.

params.name: Strategy
params.description: How to deliver the update. 'Immediate' posts immediately (optionally clearing any other pending updates); 'Last' posts when the game session ends.

params.name: Notification
params.description: Whether to send a push notification for the custom update. Only use push notifications for updates that are essential and immediately actionable.

actions.name: Switch game
actions.description: Request that the client switch to a different Instant Game.

params.name: App ID
params.description: The Application ID of the Instant Game to switch to. It must belong to the same business as the current game.

params.name: Data
params.description: A string of data to attach, available as EntryPointData if launched from the switch. Max 1000 chars.

actions.name: Change context
actions.description: Opens a dialog allowing the player to switch to a different context.
actions.display_text: Change context with filter [i]{0}[/i], min size [i]{1}[/i], max size [i]{2}[/i]

params.name: Filter
params.description: How to filter the suggested contexts.

params.name: Min size
params.description: The minimum number of participants that a suggested context should ideally have. Use -1 to specify no limit.

params.name: Max size
params.description: The maximum number of participants that a suggested context should ideally have. Use -1 to specify no limit.

actions.name: Subscribe to bot
actions.description: Prompt the user to subscribe to a bot associated with the game.

expressions.name: Platform
expressions.description: A string describing the current platform the game is being played on.

expressions.name: SDKVersion
expressions.description: The version of the Instant Games SDK in use.

expressions.name: ContextID
expressions.description: A unique identifier for the current game context.

expressions.name: PlayerName
expressions.description: The name of the current player.

expressions.name: PlayerPhotoURL
expressions.description: A URL to the player's current profile image.

expressions.name: PlayerID
expressions.description: A unique identifier for the current player.

expressions.name: PlayerData
expressions.description: In 'On loaded player data', the string of the loaded player data.

expressions.name: EntryPointData
expressions.description: A string of data associated with this launch of the game, e.g. from a share.

expressions.name: ConnectedPlayerCount
expressions.description: After 'On connected players loaded', the number of connected players.

expressions.name: ConnectedPlayerIDAt
expressions.description: The player ID of a connected player at an index.

params.name: Index
params.description: The index of the connected player.

expressions.name: PlayerScore
expressions.description: After 'On player score loaded', the player's current score.

expressions.name: PlayerRank
expressions.description: After 'On player score loaded', the player's current rank on the leaderboard.

expressions.name: LeaderboardResultCount
expressions.description: After 'On leaderboard loaded', the number of results on the leaderboard.

expressions.name: LeaderboardScoreAt
expressions.description: The score of a result at an index on a leaderboard.

params.name: Index
params.description: The index of the result.

expressions.name: LeaderboardPlayerIDAt
expressions.description: The session-scoped player ID for a result at an index on a leaderboard.

params.name: Index
params.description: The index of the result.
